metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39879 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Missing authentication in all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 7.11.0 allows an attacker with access to a victim's session to disable two-factor authentication

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
